name: The endless junkjard
description:
The endless junkyard is a simple simulation game about a little robot (yes, Wall-E was an inspiration) that has to recycle and organize tons of incoming trash. But the civilization produces so much trash that he simply "Delays the inevitable": The overflowing of the junkyard.

What to do with all the trash:

- Compress  Metal trash to compact cubes

- Burn Wooden trash

- Deposite nuclear barrels

- Stack compressed cubes

Features:

- WebGL

-Full controller support!
(right trigger to pick up, left trigger to throw, left stick to move, right stick to look around)

Developed by SufficientlyRoasted
